content.detailedDescription: Triangular object blinking. smaller objects moving either towards or away from main object. part of triangular object would blink then the smaller one(s) would blink the same color. seemed to be moving upwards away from where we were standing. at one point, one smaller object seemed to be swaying towards then away from larger, triangular object. faint whistling was heard from all directions along with pings coming from the general direction of the object. one small object moved above the house (another one disappeared behind a neighbors). observed a few streaks heading in the direction of the triangular object. may have been meteors though. before going outside, a flash of light came through a window. my friend and i observed the objects until we suddenly felt incredibly uneasy for no reason.
content.summary: Triangular object blinking. smaller objects moving either towards or away from main object.

content.detailedDescription:
While fishing in [location removed]  several of us fishing,  witnessed a dark rotating, square shaped object that reflected the sun from its flat surface. it traveled from west to east.
(8 witnesses)
content.summary: Observed a rotating dark object that reflected the sun.Straight path not ascending like a balloon

content.detailedDescription: I was out watching meteorites. news said good night to see them. after a few minutes of watching i noticed a star disappeared, i took a second look and realized something had flown in front of the star. that's when i realized what i was looking at. it was huge, the largest flying thing i have ever seen in the air.It was just slightly different color the the sky itself. in the shape of a v . there were no lights, or sound. it was flying south towards salt lake city.It only took about 6-9 seconds before. the light pollution made it impossible to see. and it was gone. what realy took me back was the size of it. it was huge and very fast.I waited to see anything else but nothing happened.It was 10:00pm when this happened.I was super excited. i have only seen 2 ufos in my life. with over 30 years between, sightings.
content.summary: Was out watching shooting stars. when object flew over very fast. south. lost sight after 10 sec due to light polution

content.detailedDescription: Out side house star watching light aprouching from west moveing east with no sound slowed down and then continued moveing east lost site when moved behind trees object was seen also on 8/9/2015 just before midnite by myself and friend no satlelite object going through cloud layer!!!
content.summary: Dimond shape headed east

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1992 or 1993, while driving from trabuco canyon, ca. to anaheim, ca. for a meeting at the learning light foundation at 7:30 p.M. my friend, judy was driving. we came to a red traffic light on lincoln and harbor in anaheim. i looked up and saw thousands of these black "shadow" disc shapes in the sky. they were everywhere. my first comment to judy was, "what the h*** is that? she said, "i don't know." the light changed to green and we drove on to our destination. i could still see these black oval shapes. some were quite large. the remainder were of various sizes. don't know if, the size was determined by distance from them to me or not. the sky was full of these objects. i heard no sound. no lights. no metal configurations. they were very similar to "shadows" in the sky. my sense was this wasn't a good thing. strangely, judy and i never talked about it, again. we didn't mention the experience to those at the meeting. just kind of ignored the whole experience. how could there have been so many objects in the sky and no one else seemed to notice them? i would estimate over 1,000 objects. as of today, i've never heard of such a sighting. would be interested in knowing if, others have had this same experience and their thoughts on what all those black spots were doing in the sky?

in early 1950, i was presented with the sight of a burnished gold ufo flying over my house. it was silent. i ran outside (i was a teenage at the time) these black objects were nothing like what i had seen years before. the memory has stayed with me all these years and i didn't know what to do with the information. and, who would believe me....I wasn't a teenager at this last sighting. as far as this sighting is concerned, that is all i can recall. it had pretty much only lasted during the red light and as we drove on down the street. the sun was getting into our eyes and driving was difficult because of it. oddly, i don't recall any other traffic in the area.....

i've had other experiences but, this one is the one that stays with me. why didn't the jets from el toro marine base take pursuit or at least, investigate???? 

i appreciate your time in reading about my sighting. maybe, someone out there has answers for me. 'cause, i sure don't have any.
content.summary: Early 1990's heading west in anaheim, ca. at a stop light. saw thousands of back objects of various sizes in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio observing the incoming weather, when i noticed a darker grey object agains the clouds. i took a photo of it and about two minutes later it faded into the cloud.
content.summary: I was looking at the storm clouds and noticed a darker grey against the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
We always hung out on a tresell [old motor parkway] the parkway was shut down 20years ago it was a great place to drink beers away from the public.It was a warm night, over 50 of us from different schools and 2 police officers john n paul-twins that would check on us time to time to make sure we weren't to loud and causing problems to the neighbors that were about a100 yrds away.It was about 11pm and we were getting hungry and running out of beers i reached into the cooler grabbed one of the beers pulled the tab and looked up and gasped loud! that's when everyone looked up an saw a mile wide ufo hovering right above us at about 200 ft no words everyone was silent for about 10 min until it went into the clouds, all of our watches said it was 11pm so we went to friendly's restaurant to grab some fries an shakes it was open till 12 am it was a 10 to 15 min walk when we got there it was closed so we all went our separate ways when i got home it was 2:00 am my house is a 15 min walk to friend's most of us were grounded for a week for coming home late.We came back to the tresel a week later and found the tresel was gone.This tresel was huge it used to be a bridge for a highway 4 lanes 70 ft in length 50 ft across around a 100 tons we never talked about that night until i brought it up at a class reunion and was giving the cold shoulder and was told not to talk about it.I will never forget that night and from that i am a different person i believe in ufo's from that day  
(47 witnesses)
content.summary: Over 50 class mates saw mile wide ufo hovering then move into cloud slow 3 hrs missing time

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed a flash in the sky then watched as a craft dimmed a little then crossed the sky for at least 5 minutes before disappearing so i called my cousin to tell him and it reappeared doing the same thing in a different part of the sky and he saw it too from a different city then i seen it 2 more times and kept getting overwhelming emotions and my eyes started watering and i got goose bumps and its still continuing it started after 10 it's 11:47 pm as i write this and i'm still seeing it in different places in the sky about every 10 to 15 minutes and i know it's not the meteor shower we're having tonight because i've seen a meteor shower and its not the same. 
and as i'm writing this it has reappeared, and metro airport have been having planes take off at unusually low altitudes and i know it's unusual because i've lived watching them here all my life i know the way they come in and take off,i tried to take a video. but i couldn't pick up anything on my cell phone just a black screen but i still have the videos on my cell phone.Thank you for your time and i hope some one gets this tonight and can try to witness this.
content.summary: Spotted glowing object in the sky tonight and i've been seeing it multiple times and i'm still seeing it  comivarious parts of the sky,it's still continuing

content.detailedDescription:
In july 1978 my girlfriend  and i and one other couple,were to meet at [location removed]  to spend one night camping. my girlfriend and i got to the site and partially set up the camp,then left to buy some food at a grocery store nearby.

the camp was small and like others in the campground, was surrounded by trees with a nominal "sky view "above

while we were gone,our friends (other couple) showed up.They were setting up their camp at about 7 pm (still light out) when a huge object floated into the sky view. the "craft" made no sound at all but was at "tree-top "level and slowly drifted across until it was no longer in view. they said you could see a whole array of "mechanical" details of the underside of the craft (piping/vents etc.)they said it "filled the sky", 300 ft long at least.The eerie thing they mentioned was that it was  silent; just floated by...

we arrived  to greet our friends about 20 minutes after it happened and they were visibly "freaked out" and excitedly/fearfully talking about what they had seen.

i want to add that none of us had done any drugs or drink .We were ages 19- 24 at the time.

i am still friends with the other couple, 37 years later. as recently as 2 years ago i brought it up to my male friend, trying to get him to talk about what he saw,but he "didn't want to talk about it"

we all still live within 40 miles of the park where it happened.
content.summary: Large object floated into the sky view. the

content.detailedDescription: Un ami me dit vient je vais te montrer des ovnis alors je le suis et arriver sur place un très grand rond d herbre couchées se trouve devant je dis t es sérieux la je ne les vois pas mais l herbe était bien pliées comme si un objet aurait bien atteris la avec une force centrifuge qui aurais couchées l herbe alors in reste sue place 30 minutes sans rien voir sur ou prêt de la il m as dit avoir cial ovni alors on décide de rebrousser chemin à 5 minutesde là je m arrête pour observer le ciel et à ma grande surprise je vois pas un mais deux objets triangulaire à 15,000 ou 20,000 pieds d alltutude les deux objets triangulaires avec les lumières différentes aux extrémités tournais sur elles mêmes tranquillements je lui dit vois tu il me dit oui alors on remarche quelques pas et ont arrêtés de nouveau ils étaient encore en rotation au dessus de nos têtes alors on s en alla je crois qu' avoir rester là 1 heure elles auraits encore étés visibles xxxx
content.summary: Deux objet triangulaires plusieurs couleurs de lumiere tres haut dans ciel 20,000 pieds

content.detailedDescription: I was out side smoking a cig and i always look up in the sky i saw something flicking in the distance i grab my binoculars' 7x50mm /366ft/1000yds and i looked at my watch it in the same place it hasn't moved ssw/210 degrees it was at 10pm & its almost 11pm and its still there it hasn't moved ssw .
content.summary: Lights flicking starlights  green red blue

content.detailedDescription: Lors d une promenade avec le chien belle journée de printemps je regardait le ciel comme toujours à la recherche d ovnis lorsque en regardant je croyais voir un avion lorsque j ai bien vu que cela ne bougeait pas je me tourne la tête pour surveiller le chien et disparus je l ai observer une trentaine de secondes disparus en une seconde
content.summary: L objet metalique stationnaire demeuras 30 secondes tres etincellant et disparu en un instant

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching shooting stars since there were many on the night from the 12th to the 13th, from around 2:30am to 3:45am. we were watching the sky from a lawn and we were alone. someone with a flashlight annoyed us from quite a distance but he disappeared.
at first we saw something triangle shaped flying northeast around 50 meters above us, floating, no sound, nothing. while it was hard to see it couldnt have been a bird, a bat is highly unlikely because the movement was very smooth and it had a very geometrical look.

then we saw something else, something moving, like a plane. but it had no blinking lights and made sudden 90° movements. it looked like a star, but upon further inspection it had barely visible tentacles around it, but very fine and detailed, we are 2 witnesses. they moved away and slowly disappeared and got more and more transparent. there were multiple ones, around 5-6, sometimes dangerously close to each others.
while i was scared, my friend was more excited about it. we tried to explain it in any way, but it seems impossible. nothing can move like that. while following a path it did irregular movements.

we lost sight because it slowly went away from above us to somewhere else, the lightsmog made it fade away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple star like object with

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog there were lots of bats out flying low all over the place witch is not normal when walking him in return had me looking for the bats when i got close to a school we pass through at the corner i looked up and there was the star like light sitting still then moved side to side up and than back down kept moving around than blinked bright light than descended behind the houses never saw again this went on for about a min and a half.  back about one year ago storm just got done there were clouds all over a bright light cam in from the west very bright light light went out me and my daughter watched as when the heat ligthtning lit  the sky above the clouds a round dark disk was moving under clouds mad a couple stops and start moves got behind some trees as we were watching it it just vanished.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like light moving around side to side then decended

content.detailedDescription: My brother and his fiance and i were driving back from their work in sonora towards angels camp. along highway 49 as we came into a low ground i noticed light emanating around the next bend. as we came around the bend we saw a black triangle hovering over a house in a small hill pulsating it's lights. we pulled onto the road that lead to the house and had enough time to get out and stare for at least 20 seconds at it. it was about 400 feet away and the craft was about 120 to 150 feet long with white bright lights on each corner of it. the craft was covered in what appeared to be heat waves that hot summer asphalt gives off. after the twenty seconds passed the craft descended below the tree line to the west of the house. we then turned around and took multiple back roads to try and find it but it was gone.
content.summary: The triangle was hovering over a house on a small hill flashing it's lights.

content.detailedDescription: En me prommenant avec le chien un objet attiré mon attention vers la gauche à a un km de moi avec léger bruit l objet cherchait quelque chose ou explorait les bois au dessus de 500  a 1000 pieds du sol l objet montait et descendait tout en avançant et reculant à l occassion cela duras 5 minutes ou plus je m areteais de marcher pour constater sa progression continu il disparu ensuite
content.summary: Promenade avec chien objet descendant ascendant tout en avancant en prospection pres de ferme et boise

content.detailedDescription: A la saint jean baptiste vers minuit avec quatre autres personnes moi seul ait eu le temps d observer deux objet même direrction sauf un en zig zag direction comme en s éloignant en trajectoire en arc , un semblait en difficulté 15 à 20 secondes, le lendemain j ai appelle l aéroport et il nonrien vus cette nuit là xxx
content.summary: 2 objet cote a cote meme direction un en ligne droite l autre en zig zag tres rapide

content.detailedDescription: L objet était avec 2 étoiles lorsqu elle se déplaçait du triangle elle montait et descendait tout en approchant dans ma direction a 5000 pieds aprox... je prommenais le chien alors je m arrêtais pour le voir disparaître vers le fleuve vers l est en 1 minute tout en montant et descendant dans un mouvement de haut en bas il disparuau -dessus des nuages
content.summary: Objet lumineux avancant en descendant et montant continuellement lors promenade avec chien

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front garden at midnight facing north to watch thr perseids meteor shower, i saw 6 in a half hour which lasted for a second or two...But these 5 or 6 objects flew horizontly right across my field of vision for about 5 or 6 seconds, at first i thought seagulls, but there was no flapping of wings and the flight path was very straight, they were close together but not in any obvious formation, and they stayed in the same position without moving away or closer to each other.  they were a dull grey in coluor, slightly boomarang in shape and seemed to be at a slow speed. they went out of view past the trees in my garden.
content.summary: Observing perseid shower coming from the jorth when 5 or six objects flew in a straight line past my field of view

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home on a fine evening, the sky was clear and the only other object in the sky was a bright, full moon.

i was descending a steep hill when i noticed a vividly bright, orange light in the sky. because it was so bright, i assumed at first that the object was the planet venus. 

i should say at this point that the sighting took place approximately 15 miles from heathrow airport. however, this was certainly not an aircraft (having grown up and lived in the area most of my life i'm very familiar with planes!) 

as i continued walking i realised that the object was in fact rather close by; 2 miles or so at a guess. it was hovering, perfectly still and shining brilliantly. as the minutes passed i grew increasingly puzzled and so took a photograph using my iphone. 

shortly after taking a picture the glow dimmed (in a steady way, as though it was controlled by a dimmer switch). it was still quite bright however and was clearly orb shaped. after dimming, the object moved sideways in a perfectly straight line and disappeared from view. 

(note, in the attached photograph the orange lights
content.summary: Bright, orange light... hovered before coasting sideways

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were watching the shooting stars mixture off slow and flashes all normal.
when a slow moving shooting star/ufo travelling west to east (right to left) directly above us flashing brightly for a second on and off (dull) simultaneously. 
it travelled across half of the visual sky then disappeared without fading out like regular shooting star.
we saw lots of regular shooting stars fast and slow but this was completely different.

do shooting stars flash on and off over such a huge distance over the sky? 
we have witnessed many shooting stars but whatever we saw tonight was completely different.

does anyone have an explaination for what we saw tonight?
content.summary: Shooting star. flashing on/off simultaneously, slow moving then disappeared distance half the horizon directly above the entire sky

content.detailedDescription: The power was out due to a heavy storm of wind rain lighting. went out on front porch as power was out around midnight. storm was moving away looked up over trees and saw a color changing orb.Reds yellows white moved alittle was viewed for ten minutes then it vanished,went around to back of house was looking up and saw a bright flash then a white trail in direction of moving storm it moved very fast, it was really interesting and exciting not the firsy time i have seen ufos.
content.summary: Looked up saw it changing colors we were having heavy storms

content.detailedDescription:
I had an appointment in orlando. i was travelling there minding my business when i saw the object hovering over the shoulder. it was shiny silver with no markings of any kind. it simply hovered. i tried to find out about it but the airport claimed nothing showed up on their radar and that they had no knowledge of it. i noticed it because it was so large and put of place. this area is rural. it sort of freaked me out.I don't know what it was. it had the shape of a jumbo crayon. that is the most accurate way to describe what i saw.I am happy to finally have someone to tell. it is not the on my weird thing that has happened to me. other inexplicable things that i have never spoken of have happened a few times. i wasn't afraid just curious. i have hoped for a plausible explanation for a number of things the sighting is not the most nor the least curious. i lost sight when i drove away. i had an appointment.
i wish i had taken pictures.
content.summary: The object was silver with no visible rivets or windows. it was entirely smooth. it just hovered.  the area was remote. i called the sanford airport but they claimed to know nothing.

content.detailedDescription: I will show you were it came down. it landed in a small body of water was there for 3 days. at first i only saw churning water. second day took an i.R. camera and saw it or the shape of it in the water and out of the water. third day was still there. did not drive by it for two days lost ir camera and when i drove by no churning water. there is a second site and i will not go near it because of the black helicopters and drones flying around. have not seen the helicopters for a week still get interference from drones. i dont know what they are looking for but i dont think they found it. i have no evidence. the tops of the trees have died like they were sprayed by something like a crop duster all trees died from the top down  in a specific landing path to the water. if this area burns after i send this please do not contact me
content.summary: Came down in water caused tons of fog and sat in water for two days

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the perseid meteor shower with my parents and saw a large (huge) chevron-shape made of small orange/red lights glide over our garden - i thought it was a bird at first and my parents did too, but no bird is that big. went from east to west horizons and we wouldn't've seen it if it weren't for the meteor shower tonight as well. very spooked at the moment, especially since i only just reported a childhood incident of mine today as well. tried to take photos on my phone but the camera isn't great at night i will enhance the images as much as i can to see if i can get anything to show up.
content.summary: Watching perseids with parents - large shape overhead,thought it was a big bird at first

content.detailedDescription: I had my friend over and she was laying in the bed with me sound asleep and i jolted awake and sat up and something was calling me to open my door so i did and across my room is my bathroom so when i opened my door i saw a tall black entity in my bathroom window but as soon as it saw me it quickly turned and hid behind the door. after this happened i would feel watched and hear what sounds like a control room but in a different language i've never heard. i was never scared just startled.
content.summary: Did not see ufo have heard one

content.detailedDescription: Blue/blue-green dot/star like object visible from right side of vistula river near slasko-dabrowski bridge (52.247545, 21.025510). object moved from palace of culture (as seen from provided location), just over horizon and top of the building just over ko¶ció³ seminaryjny (pokarmelicki) in warsaw. it has characteristic towers. object fainted to completely dark for ~30-45 then re-appeared. after that it moved over horizon in west direction.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Constant brightness, blue / blue-green object. no visible position lights like aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my parents place at 12:20 recording myself because i was seeing weird stuff in the sky and everything went quiet for a moment, and just not your normal quietness, anyways i saw a orb in the sky flying all directions until it took off towards the north and vanished. then another showed up to the ne and was bobbing up and down like a yo-yo and vanished quite quickly. suddenly no more than 5min after another craft showed up above the trees in front of me no more than 100-150ft from me with red and green lights pulsating around the object and all of a sudden the lights went out and it started to glow red in the center a bit and it just kept getting more red and as it was turning more red it was making a humming or roaring sound and it kept getting louder the more red it got. as this was happening i was walking back closer to the house and gradge and it took off with the whitest light that i have ever seen and just as it was flying over me it stoped and i know this sounds crazy and im not religious so anyways it stoped above me and opened up and it was a angel i saw her wings face smiling at me and her feet were crossed and in that short moment she made me understand that everything is going to be ok for us, i never felt more at peace and anyways shortly after she folded up her wings and took off. my mom was heading home from work around 2:00am in the morning and when she was coming close to harcourt she saw weird red orb in the sky and my mother does no believe in that kind of stuff, so when i was telling my story to my mom and dad,she said she also seen something the same night. i don't think that i got anything on my cell but ill give u what ever i can to help? i took a little bit of video audio but i stopped recording shortly after i started hearing weird sounds because i stopped it and ran for the house, i wasn't really concerned about my cell at the time but when i seen the glowing object i tried to get it to record but no success. not sure may have been my own fault because i was so stunned when i seen the glowing object. sorry i wish i could have got it!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo droped to tree line level,hovered turned red and flew above me and transformed to an angel,then took off

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on our end porch saying goodbye to two friends.  a reflective flash in the sky caught my eye and i looked up and saw a cigar shaped aircraft with one row of windows from front to back heading south at a slow to moderate speed.  i pointed to it and asked "what is that?"  everyone looked up and commented that they did not know.  i glanced down to our friends and when i looked back up, the cigar shaped object had reversed its trajectory to the north and was moving at a faster speed. it was not a zip bang, gone speed, but was much faster than before.  it did not  have time to turn around. it simply was traveling in the opposite direction (north) from its original direction (south).  the object did not have a cone shape on either end like the nose of a airplane, but was more like a blunt to soft parenthesis shape like a cigar is shaped. it was a cloudless sky, it had no wings, no lights (as it was daylight), and made no noise.  it almost seemed that the craft knew that it was seen, since it changed direction so suddenly.

i was very excited, with wonder, to see this object and the others had a more non expression of excitement, almost to the point of being unable to comment.  i could not understand why as this was something that none of us had seen before. our friends left and my husband went back into the house.  i stayed and watched the craft, even going into the yard to watch it, without tree obstruction until it got out of sight.  this sighting has really peaked my interest and i continue to watch the skies to see if i could see it again.

i didn't have a camera or my cell phone with me, so i could not take a picture of the craft.  i didn't even think of a camera at this point.  i was just amazed at what i had just seen.  i think it was a few minutes later that i realized that we had just seen a ufo!  i have looked and looked on the internet to see if i could find an object that looked like the craft that we had seen.  i did finally find one while looking at ufo aircraft pictures on the internet.
content.summary: Shinny cigar shaped object with one row of windows from front to rear.

content.detailedDescription:
Lebanon, or ~9:30 pm. i looked through my house window while in my bedroom and noticed a bright light moving fast in the sky. i had heard there were meteor showers happening that night so i went outside to watch. but, the light was moving very fast and not like the meteors i have seen. then i had the thought it was a planet or satellite. the light was very bright steady white light (no flashing lights) and looked similar in size and brightness to a planet.
            then the light started to slow down and it changed directions multiple times. at this point i had no idea what this thing could be- it wasn’t behaving like the meteors, planets or satellites that i typically see in the sky. i went inside quickly to get my cell phone to take photos/video and get my husband. he then came outside and watched the light with me. at this point the light suddenly changed color from bright white to red. this was really weird to see happen and kind of freaked us out because we had no idea what it could be! when it changed color i knew it was for sure not a planet or meteor. then the red light started to descend even more when we lost it behind the tree line.  it looked as if it was descending toward the ground.
            we walked down the block to see if we could spot it behind the trees. we then saw another white light moving similarly (speeding up/slowing down, changing directions suddenly and then looked to descend toward the ground). we followed it as long as we could before it moved out of sight. we did not see the second light change color like the first one.
            i have attached photos of the light after it changed red. the light looked very large and bright. i took video of the light for at least 20 seconds, i saw the video recording and we only turned it off when the light descended from view but for some reason only about 2 seconds of the video saved…. not sure what is up with that!
content.summary: Bright white light moving fast and changing directions. the light turned red and descended towards the ground. a second white light was seen moving similarly.
